title: Beas Kund
subtitle: Source of the Beas River
about: Beas Kund is a rewarding short trek that takes you to the glacial lake source of the Beas River. Starting from Solang Valley, it offers quick access to high-altitude scenery with Hanuman Tibba and the Seven Sisters peaks looming large.
seo_title: Beas Kund Trek — Manali Glacial Lake
seo_description: A short but spectacular trek from Manali to the glacial Beas Kund lake, offering massive views of summits like Hanuman Tibba.

trek_places.name: Dhundi
trek_places.about: Dhundi is the road-head where the trek begins, offering the first clear views of the high peaks. The walk from here follows the river through birch forests.
what_to_do: Start the walk through the forest

trek_places.name: Beas Kund Lake
trek_places.short: Small glacial lake at the base of peaks
trek_places.about: The lake itself is small but the setting is grand, sitting in a bowl formed by high peaks. Legends say Sage Vyas meditated here; it’s a peaceful spot for reflection.
what_to_do: Sit by the clear glacial water
